summary_comment: Professor Anagnostou is highly regarded for his passion and intelligence as an instructor, though his classes involve significant reading. Students find his teaching style approachable and enjoyable, with one describing it as the "best" and leading to an "Easy A." However, exams can be challenging, and grades were occasionally delayed, impacting students' ability to track their performance.
summary_comment_short: Professor Anagnostou is highly regarded for his passion and intelligence as a teacher, though his classes require significant reading and can be challenging, particularly during exams. Students find his classes fairly easy to pass but note that consistent engagement with the material is essential for success.

Ratings.comment: Great guy and fairly easy class. Unfortunately no grades were put in Carmen all semester so I didnt know where I stood until I got my final grade.
He is the best!!!!!! Easy A

Very passionate and intelligent. I really enjoyed him as a teacher. However, there is a lot of reading, so be aware of that. Also, exams can be a little difficult, so make sure you pay attention to the readings and lecture throughout the class. Many topics are very interesting, others not so much. Overall, I really like him.

summary_comment: Professor Peterson is highly regarded for her excellent rapport with students and her easygoing nature, making her classes accessible and enjoyable. She is known for her straightforward approach, assigning manageable weekly quizzes and clear homework expectations, which contribute to high class averages.
summary_comment_short: Professor Peterson is highly regarded for her excellent rapport with students and her easygoing nature, making her classes accessible and enjoyable. Her teaching approach focuses on consistent attendance and completion of assignments, leading to strong academic performance, with a class average of 92.8%.

Ratings.comment: Anna was great.  She was easygoing, and I agree with the previous rater's description of her having an "excellent rapport with students."  If you show up and do the assignments, you will get an A.
Easy weekly quizzes, attend class and you should be fine. Anna is very nice and helpful, and definitely an easy grader.
Anna is incredibly helpful, intelligent, and easygoing. she has a great rapport with students. Take her classes. That is all.

Really nice and straightforward.  Translate 30 or so lines per day for homework.  Class consists of translating.  The final project was really fun: translating 20 or so lines of poetry into colloquial English.  The class average for the class was 92.8%.

summary_comment: Professor Dubina is highly regarded for her dedication and support, consistently working to help students succeed. While she finds Latin grammar inherently challenging to make engaging, she excels in providing additional support and ensuring students are prepared through daily attendance and quizzes. Her teaching approach is praised for its effectiveness.
summary_comment_short: Professor Dubina is highly regarded for her dedication to student success and her efforts to make complex subjects engaging. While she excels in supporting students and ensuring they are prepared for quizzes, some topics, like Latin grammar, present inherent challenges.

Ratings.comment: Dubina is extrememly helpful, you can tell she wants you to succeed.  She tries her best to make the subject matter interesting, however, when the subject matter is Latin grammar, that's nearly impossible.  She will work with you if you need it.  Come to class every day, because there's probably a quiz.  Great teacher!
Didn't read much went to her recitation and aced most of the quizzes. I recommend taking this class with Ric Rader and Dubina as your TA.

summary_comment: Professor Saxey is highly regarded for his extensive knowledge and ability to help students understand complex topics. Students find him approachable and dedicated to their learning, often staying after class to assist with questions. While some note that he occasionally veers off-topic, they appreciate the additional insights this provides.
summary_comment_short: Professor Saxey is highly regarded for his extensive knowledge and ability to help students understand complex material. Students find his classes engaging, though some note that he occasionally goes off on tangents.

Ratings.comment: Roderick was an awesome TA, I learned a lot from him. Very helpful! Brought in other stories that made the myths more understandable. He needs to talk louder but he added a lot that the main professor didn't talk about. Quirky sense of humor. Easy grader, do all the readings and you've got an A, my grade was higher than I expected.
He was amazing! Really good. Knows a lot and helps you understand. I would definitely take his class again.

Nice guy, very helpful and you can tell he wants to help you understand.  He'll explain things after class if you ask him. He sometimes goes off on tangents, but you'll learn a lot if you pay attention.

summary_comment: Professor Dourou is highly regarded for her exceptional teaching quality, described as the best instructor by multiple students. She is known for her kindness, willingness to help, and ability to make the class both enjoyable and educational. Students consistently praise her supportive approach and dedication to their learning.
summary_comment_short: Professor Dourou is highly regarded for her exceptional teaching quality, being described as the best instructor by multiple students who praise her kindness, readiness for classes, and willingness to help. Students consistently highlight her supportive and engaging approach, making her one of the top professors they have encountered.

Ratings.comment: Best prof I have ever had! She was the nicest person ever and would do anything to help her students. You were always prepared for any tests or quizzes and learned a lot.

She is the best instructor I have ever experienced in college. She is very understand and kind and does anything possible to help you. I would recommend her class to anyone. I love it when she brings Greek food for the class as well!
Love Calliopi... she's so helpful and nice.  She does spoil us though... Couldn't ask for a better prof
I wish I had another class with Mrs Dourou! She should get nominated for best Teacher!

Calliopi is amazing. She's really funny and makes the class a lot of fun to attend even when you are learning grammar. She is always willing to help and re-explain something if people don't understand. She works with students and gives them choices and takes their comments in to consideration. One of the best professors I have ever had.
